T.query: select q.surveyid,c.questionid,c.id from questions q join choices c on q.id = c.questionid where ( q.externalsystemid >75 and q.etl_time > '2016-12-28') or (c.active = 't' and q.questioncode >8 ) or (  c.choiceposition <2  and  q.maxresponses = -1)

F.query: select q.surveyid,c.questionid,c.id from questions q join choices c on q.id = c.questionid where ( q.externalsystemid >80 and q.etl_time > '2016-12-28') or (c.active = 't' and q.questioncode >8 ) or (  c.choiceposition <2  and  q.maxresponses = -1)

select q.surveyid,c.questionid,c.id from questions q join choices c on q.id = c.questionid where ( q.externalsystemid >75 and q.etl_time > '2016-12-28') or (c.active = 't' and q.questioncode >8 ) or (  c.choiceposition <=2  and  q.maxresponses = -1)

select q.surveyid,c.questionid,c.id from questions q join choices c on q.id = c.questionid where ( q.externalsystemid >75 and q.etl_time > '2016-12-28') or (c.active = 't' and q.questioncode >8 ) or (  c.choiceposition <2  and  q.maxresponses = -1 and c.etl_time >'2017-02-01' )

select q.surveyid,c.questionid,c.id from questions q join choices c on q.id = c.questionid where ( q.externalsystemid >75 and q.etl_time > '2016-12-28') or (q.required = 't' and q.questioncode >8 ) or (  c.choiceposition <2  and  q.maxresponses = -1)

select q.surveyid,c.questionid,c.id from questions q join choices c on q.id = c.questionid where ( q.externalsystemid >75 and q.etl_time > '2016-12-28') or (q.questioncode >8 ) or (  q.maxresponses = -1)

select q.surveyid,c.questionid,c.id from questions q join choices c on q.id = c.questionid where ( q.externalsystemid >75 and q.etl_time > '2016-12-30') or (c.active = 't' and q.questioncode >8 ) or (  c.choiceposition <3  and  q.maxresponses = -1)
